mapper.select: select va.id, va.appointment_time, va.appointment_status, ai.name apartment_name, gi.name, gi.url from view_appointment va left join apartment_info ai on va.apartment_id = ai.id and ai.is_deleted = 0 left join graph_info gi on gi.item_type = 1 and gi.item_id = ai.id and gi.is_deleted = 0 where va.is_deleted = 0 and va.user_id = #{userId} order by va.create_time desc
